org.beanfabrics.event
Interface ModelProviderListener

public interface ModelProviderListener

The listener interface for receiving ModelProviderEvents.

A listener object created from this class can be registered with a IModelProvider using the IModelProvider.addModelProviderListener(org.beanfabrics.Path, ModelProviderListener) method.

Author:
Michael Karneim

Method Summary
 void modelGained(ModelProviderEvent evt)
          Invoked after a presentation model has been made available at a specific path.
 void modelLost(ModelProviderEvent evt)
          Invoked after a presentation model has been made unavailable at a specific path.
